name: Ride Operator
description:
Ride operator is a small game where you manage a simple theme park dark ride. Your goal is to keep the wait time as low as possible by being efficient in loading guests.

I'm a solo developer with a passion for theme parks. This game is still under development, so a few updates are planned to add more fun. There is currently no sound in the game.

Let me know if you encounter any issue, and I'd love to read your feedback.

Controls

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look around

E to interact

ESC to pause game and open menu

Have fun!
